## BaseDashboard class

The base component that provides basic functionality to create a dashboard.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BaseDashboard<P, S> extends Component<P, S & BaseDashboardState> 
```
**Extends:** Component&lt;P, S &amp; BaseDashboardState&gt;

|  --- | --- | --- |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [componentDidMount()](./teamsfx-react.basedashboard.componentdidmount.md) |  | Called after the component is mounted. You can do initialization that requires DOM nodes here. You can also make network requests here if you need to load data from a remote endpoint. |
|  [componentWillUnmount()](./teamsfx-react.basedashboard.componentwillunmount.md) |  | Called before the component is unmounted and destroyed. You can do necessary cleanup here, such as invalidating timers, canceling network requests, or removing any DOM elements. |
|  [layout()](./teamsfx-react.basedashboard.layout.md) | <code>protected</code> | Override this method to define the layout of the widget in the dashboard. |
|  [render()](./teamsfx-react.basedashboard.render.md) |  | Defines the default layout for the dashboard. |
|  [styling()](./teamsfx-react.basedashboard.styling.md) | <code>protected</code> | Override this method to customize the dashboard style. |
